Articles.Content: You can if you want, I suppose, but the model isn't finished by any means; it's not even textured.

You can if you want, I suppose, but the model isn't finished by any means; it's not even textured.

Thank you!
so I guess this is just instant incineration for kerbals if you have DRE installed or FAR?
DRE? Probably. FAR? Probably not. DRE+FAR? Not if your spacecraft is aerodynamic enough.
I am looking forward to the next update. I love the mass driver! I also play combat. I actually found this while searching for ace combat 5
I have misplaced the source code for this. Bear with me.
Any thoughts on when the next update to this will come?
After I find the source code. It is (hopefully) on another computer. If I can't find it, I'll have to re-write the plugin from scratch.
I'm not a coder, so i have no idea: Do you actually need the source code, or would a copy of the released .zip do?...Cuz I have that, if that would help...
